+             messageText.textContent = 'æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½æƒ…è¯...';

+         ];
+ 
+         function getRandomMessage() {
+             const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * loveMessages.length);
+             return loveMessages[randomIndex];
+         }
